title: The Phoenix is Back - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Historical   Josei   Romance
tags: Ancient China   Female Protagonist   Late Romance   Reincarnation   Strategic Battles   Weak to Strong
author: Ye Lian Ning   夜恋凝
description: Xiao Xiwei is persecuted and killed by her husband and stepsister. Only then did she realize that her husband, the Emperor, never loved her. She was merely a pawn in his game. 'I'll be the ghost that haunts you in your sleep!' she cries out with a resentful voice, unwilling to die. Then, a miracle happens. When she opens her eyes again, she's reborn back to the time before she met her husband. What path will she take this time? Take revenge or live a new life?>
